scripts.electron:build: echo "Building Electron code..." && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && echo "Copying migrations..." && rm -rf dist/electron/migrations && cp -R models/migrations dist/electron/migrations && echo "Bundling preload script..." && npx esbuild electron/preload.ts --bundle --platform=node --external:electron --outfile=dist/electron/preload.js --allow-overwrite --sourcemap && echo "Creating workers directory..." && mkdir -p dist/workers && echo "Bundling readability worker..." && npx esbuild electron/workers/readabilityWorker.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/workers/readabilityWorker.js --allow-overwrite --sourcemap && echo "Copying jsdom sync worker..." && cp node_modules/jsdom/lib/jsdom/living/xhr/xhr-sync-worker.js dist/workers/ && echo "Bundling main process..." && npx esbuild electron/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --external:electron --external:better-sqlite3 --external:onnxruntime-node --external:sharp --outfile=dist/electron/main.js --allow-overwrite --sourcemap && echo "Electron build complete."
scripts.dev:electron: npm run electron:build && npm run rebuild:electron && wait-on dist/electron/main.js dist/electron/preload.js dist/workers/readabilityWorker.js && cross-env NEXT_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:3000 electron .
scripts.postinstall: echo "Skipping default Electron rebuild in postinstall"
scripts.rebuild:electron: echo 'Rebuilding better-sqlite3 for Electron...' && electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && echo 'Copying Electron build to electron_modules...' && mkdir -p electron_modules && cp -R node_modules/better-sqlite3 electron_modules/ && echo 'Restoring Node build in node_modules...' && npm rebuild better-sqlite3 --build-from-source && echo 'Rebuild process complete.'
